courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, from chord progressions to strumming techniques.

courses.title: Piano Mastery
courses.description: Master the piano with this comprehensive course covering scales, arpeggios, and more.

courses.title: Music Theory 101
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including notation, scales, and harmony.

courses.title: Singing Techniques
courses.description: Improve your singing voice with exercises and vocal techniques taught by professionals.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Get started with drumming basics, including rhythm patterns, fills, and beat coordination.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn to produce electronic music using software tools and synthesizers.

courses.title: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Unlock your creativity and learn the art of crafting compelling songs.

courses.title: Bass Guitar Basics
courses.description: Start playing bass guitar with this beginner-friendly course covering technique and theory.
